column2: I don't really like deep dish "pizza"
column3: but of the places to eat it
column4: this place is very good. Giordano's makes stuffed-crust pizza
column5: whereas Lou Manalti's makes a cheese pie using dough and sauce as crust. It's fine. The wait is really long
column6: but the service is generally fun and somewhat friendly. The food other than the pizza is what you'd expect - requisite bar food of mediocre quality that you need so it's not just "pizza" on the menu.
